text: 5:12 2 Atriviba 25:8-12; 2 Eghaghaniba 36:17-20; Jeremaia 52:12-15Fomɨra en inazir afeziaba Godɨn uan Nguibamɨn Itim gamizɨ, an atarava Kaldian gumazim Nebukatnesar, Babilonɨn atrivimɨn amamangatɨzɨ, a Godɨn Dɨpenim apɨrigha bar a gasɨghasigha, gumazamiziba inigha ghua Babilonɨn kalabus gatɨ.
